template <typename Block, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
class vsip::impl::Sliced2_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/subblock.hpp

The Sliced2_block class binds two of the indices of the underlying N-dimensional block to a constant, producing an N-2-dimensional block. N must be >= 3, and the index chosen must be allowed for the underlying block.

Specializations:
Sliced2_block<Block,0,1>
Sliced2_block<Block,0,2>
Sliced2_block<Block,1,2>
